Workflow.Name: Pulse [Child] - Post adaptive cards to maker
Workflow.Description: This child flow is triggered from the main Pulse flow. It sends adaptive cards to makers to ask for feedback and stores the response in the Pulse Feedback table. It uses AI Builder to detect sentiment and translate the survey response.

LocalizedName.description: Pulse [Child] - Post adaptive cards to maker

Description.description: This child flow is triggered from the main Pulse flow. It sends adaptive cards to makers to ask for feedback and stores the response in the Pulse Feedback table. It uses AI Builder to detect sentiment and translate the survey response.
